Class Detail
jQuery.solrjs.AbstractServerSideWidget(properties)
Baseclass for server side widgets.

The velocity response writer is used, the widget only specifies the template name in the getTemplateName() method.

Parameters:
properties
A map of fields to set. Refer to the list of non-private fields.
Method Detail
executeHttpRequest(url)
Adds the velocity specific request parameters to the url and creates a JSON call using a dynamic script tag. The html response from the velocity template gets wrapped inside a javascript object to make cross site requests possible.
Parameters:
url
The solr query request
handleResult(result)
The default behaviour is that the result of teh template is simply "copied" to the target div.
Parameters:
result
The result of the velocity template wrapped inside a javascript object.
